name: Marcos Llunas
description: '''Marcos GÃ³mez Llunas'''   (born 29 September 1971), better known as '''Marcos Llunas''', is a Spanish singer-songwriter, known in Spain and Latin America. His debut single "Para reconquistarte" reached the No.1 spot all over [[Hispanic America]]. He won the [[OTI Festival 1995]] and placed sixth in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 1997]], both representing Spain. Llunas is the son of singer [[Dyango]] and the father of the singer turned actor [[Izan Llunas]].
